event.title: FSFE Denmark local group meeting with talk: "Life without tech giants" in Aarhus, Denmark

body.p: We'll discuss how to build our daily software infrastructure on Free Software only, using decentralized and self-hosted or comunally-hosted alternatives - i.e., things like NextCloud, Mastodon (and Pixelfed etc. - Fediverse in general), Matrix, free Android distributions, etc.
Everyone is welccome ðŸ™‚ It will likely be in Danish unless some non-Danish speakers turn up, in that case we'll switch to English.
